hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Ali said:"The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) gave me two slaves who were brothers, and I sold one of them. He said: 'What happened with the two slaves?' I said: 'I sold one of them.' He said: 'Take him back

chapter.ara-name: باب النَّهْىِ عَنِ التَّفْرِيقِ، بَيْنَ السَّبْىِ
